title: RING ALARM SOUND DEAD All sound max NO Ring NO Alarm No text No email sound nothing.
content:
No SOUND externally . No sounds for anything external. NO Ring Sound, NO Alarm, NO text, NO email, NO videos, NO Speaker phone 
NO Sounds
1. Volume is max or close to max on ext speaker
2. Dnd is OFF
3. Bluetooth is OFF
4. Disabled / reset all notifications
5. Factory reset
6. Safe mode
NONE of the above worked.

What does work if using head sets and using Bluetooth ear pieces. 

This started about Android 9. It was sporadic and not it is completely off.

I have searched and attempted many fixes including installing other apps to adjust mix sound, different alarm nothing works.

HINT. Google if you are listening please heed this tip. 

1. This all started when Android started telling me my volume was too high. I have a feeling it was auto adjusting my volume.

2. How do I know... because if max the volume and go into a sound room I can hear a very faint sound coming from my two speakers at the bottom.
